articles.content: In 1989 , Mark Taylor scored 839 runs with two hundreds and five fifties in 11 innings of the six-match series.

articles.title: Watch: Bowler leaks 18 runs in one ball at Tamil Nadu Premier League - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Spartans captain Abhishek Tanwar leaked 18 before completing the last delivery of the 20th over, which resulted in 26 runs. | Cricket
articles.content: The ongoing Tamil Nadu Premier League (TNPL) witnessed a bizarre moment, as a bowler conceded 18 runs in a single delivery. The incident took place during the match between Chepauk Super Gillies and … [+1374 chars]

articles.title: Hazlewood looking to play 'at least three' Ashes Tests - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Injury, as well as an abundance of caution, have seen him play just four Tests in the last two years

articles.title: The one-word message that lured England all-rounder out of retirement - ICC Cricket
articles.description: All-rounder Moeen Ali presumed Ben Stokes was joking when he received a hopeful message from the England captain, but is now set to face arch-rivals Australia in the Ashes.
